means: 和 neither 或 not 连用

sentence.Network_en: The report concludes that I acted neither fraudulently nor improperly.
sentence.Network_cn: 报告最后认为我的行为既没有欺骗性也没有任何不妥。

sentence.Network_en: They can neither read nor write, nor can they comprehend such concepts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不会读，不会写，也理解不了这样的概念。

sentence.Network_en: That, if you'll pardon my saying so, is neither here nor there.
sentence.Network_cn: 恕我直言，那根本就不重要。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... noon 正午，中午 nor 也不，也没有 normally 通常，正常地.

石油词汇英语翻译(NO) -亿城英语 ... Nor gate 或非门 NOR 或非门 NOR-element 或非元件.
无标题文档 ... NAND—— 与非 NOR——— 或非 XOR—— 异或.

Neither Nor 两者都不-英语点津 ... Clean,Neat and Tidy 关于干净的词 Neither Nor 两者都不 Public Speaking 公共演讲.
罗布泊（lop nor）（Lop Nor），中国新疆维吾尔自治区东南部湖泊。在塔里木盆地东部，海拔780公尺左右，位于塔里木盆地的最低处。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: contraction of Old English nother 'neither'

encyclopedia.content: 日本乐队，曾演唱TVB动画神雕侠侣日文版OP。1998年在CHAGE的「Hey！ Hey! Hey! -5秒后wakaranai-」初次亮相。把名称改变成NoR后2001年10月再次亮相。此后，玲子和英子推出，2003年解散。

entry.tran: (在否定句中用于 neither 之后以引出第二项或几项中的最后一项)也不，也没有
entry.def: You use nor after 'neither' in order to introduce the second alternative or the last of a number of alternatives in a negative statement.

example.ex: Neither Mr Rose nor Mr Woodhead was available for comment yesterday...
example.tran: 昨天罗斯先生和伍德黑德先生都无暇发表意见。

example.ex: I can give you neither an opinion nor any advice...
example.tran: 我既不能给你意见，也不能提供任何建议。

entry.tran: (用于否定陈述后，表示该否定句也适用于自己、其他人或其他事物)也不，也没有
entry.def: You use nor after a negative statement in order to indicate that the negative statement also applies to you or to someone or something else.

example.ex: 'None of us has any idea how long we're going to be here.' — 'Nor do I.'...
example.tran: “我们没有人知道要在这儿呆多久。”——“我也不知道。”

example.ex: 'If my husband has no future,' she said, 'then nor do my children.'...
example.tran: “如果我丈夫没有前途，”她说，“那我的孩子们也没有。”

entry.tran: (用于否定句后，引出另一否定句补充前句)
entry.def: You use nor after a negative statement in order to introduce another negative statement which adds information to the previous one.

example.ex: Cooking up a quick dish doesn't mean you have to sacrifice flavour. Nor does fast food have to be junk food.
example.tran: 烹饪快餐并不意味着牺牲风味，快餐也不见得就一定是垃圾食品。

auth_sentence.content: Nor, for that matter, would anyone else.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor, for that matter, would anyone else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor, for that matter, would anyone else.

auth_sentence.content: Nor does it predict whether that trend will continue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor does it predict whether that trend will continue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor does it predict whether that trend will continue.

auth_sentence.content: Nor do we ultimately know much about the universe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor do we ultimately know much about the universe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor do we ultimately know much about the universe.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 其变体n用在元音前面,表示"不,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: no不,非+one一→没有一个→没有人,没有任何东西
no不,非+where什么地方, 在哪里→adv.无处, 到处都无
no不,非+one一→没有一个→没有人,没有任何东西

abbreviation.mean_cn: 正常的，正规的，规范的，标准的

Sentence.sentence: The 1909 Law did not provide full protection for films and sound recordings nor did it anticipate the need to protect radio and television.
Yet neither Barack Obama nor Mitt Romney promotes himself as tool-savvy (使用工具很在行的) presidential timber, in the mold of a Jimmy Carter, a skilled carpenter and cabinet maker.
Nor do I go to cocktail parties, dinners or anything like that.

sentences.en: Not a flower nor even a blade of grass will grow in this desert.
sentences.cn: 没有一朵花甚至一片草会生长在这沙漠里。

sentences.en: He can't do it, nor can I, nor can you, nor can anybody.
sentences.cn: 他不能做, 我也不能, 你也不能, 任何人都不能。

sentences.en: All that is true, nor must we forget about it.
sentences.cn: 那全是真的, 我们可不能忘记。

sentences.en: Neither you nor he is right.
He would neither come in nor go out.
sentences.cn: 他既不进来, 也不出去。

jushi.english: Not a flower nor even a blade of grass will grow in this desert.
jushi.chinese: 没有一朵花甚至一片草将会生长在这沙漠里。

jushi.english: All that is true, nor must we forget about it.
jushi.chinese: 那全是真的,我们可不能忘记。
